```
func encodeBatch(
    commandBuffer: any MTLCommandBuffer,
    primaryImages: [MPSImage],
    secondaryImages: [MPSImage],
    destinationStates outState: AutoreleasingUnsafeMutablePointer<NSArray?>,
    destinationStateIsTemporary isTemporary: Bool
) -> [MPSImage]
```
